data.name: Whose turn is it?
data.description:
# Background:

You are playing a cardgame with your friends but none of you seem to be able to remember whose turn it is!

In order to keep playing without having to keep track, one of your friends suggest writing a program that always tells you whose turn it is.
___ 
# Task:
Write a function that takes a list of players, represented by simple String values and the turn number.

The function should be able to determine who is next to play their card.

# Example:

```
["A","B","C"], 1 -> "A"
["A","B","C"], 2 -> "B"
["A","B","C"], 3 -> "C"
...
...
["A","B","C"], 100 -> "A"
```
___

# Note:
In order to simplify the assignment assume that the **list contains at least one player** and the **turncount is always greather than 0**
